title: Horizon House
description: Build a private house 840 sq. feet with a large living room, three bedrooms, two bathrooms, a terrace, a pool and a garage for two cars.
Modern design and care for each family member to feel as comfortable as possible in the new home.

gallery.alt: Modern two-story house with dark brick facade, large windows, and outdoor seating area.
Contemporary home with black-framed windows, stone accents, and outdoor seating.
The project is a two-storey brick house with a gable roof, chimneys and symmetrical window arrangement.
Angled view of Horizon House showing flat roof, vertical windows, and surrounding pine trees

Symmetrical front view of Horizon House with hipped roof, columns, and large vertical windows
